title: Martha Linchester

fields.name: Note:
fields.value: This role may only exist during the month of October

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Convert another player to a role generally considered a monster

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All monster themed roles are notified you exist and can win with you.
- Attempting to convert Jd (406), Lunarifish(1531), Jd, Tides of Invention (2041), Lunari, Summoner Virtuoso (2089), or Lunari (3049),will automatically result in an overkill attack coming your way, and the conversion failing.
- They will be handed the following text:
Jd:"A ghost attempted to haunt you, but you fought back!"
Lunari:"A ghost attempted to haunt you, but someone you know fought them!"
- You will be handed the text
"You tried to convert your target, but they had a shotgun! You died!"
- Attempting to convert a naturally spawned monster will notify you that they were already a monster.
- It is up to the host's discretion as to what is a monster and what isn't.
Goal:Haunt the town and rule over all monsters

desc:
Post 2234
*"Now, shall we let the main event of tonight begin?"*
